properties.title: test_sample.txt
properties.content:
Artificial intelligence is transforming the world. Machine learning algorithms 
    can analyze vast amounts of data to identify patterns and make predictions. 
    Deep learning, a subset of machine learning, uses neural networks with multiple 
    layers to process information. Natural language processing enables computers 
    to understand and generate human language. Computer vision allows machines 
    to interpret and analyze visual information from the world.

properties.content:
Email
Cong viec  Dear Mr/Ms. Xxx 
It is very happy to receive your email. How are you and your family these days? How is your work…..
Ban be  Dear …
It is such a long time since I have seen you. How are you and your family these days? How is your study? I hope everything in your life is going well. Today, I write this email for you to answer some questions that you asked me in the last email.

First of all,.
Furthermore,.
Last but not least,.

In summary, they are all the main things that I want to share with you. If you have some questions for me, please write another email to me. I will answer your email as soon as possible.
I look forward to hearing from you.
Best wishes
Jack

properties.title: Cause-Solution.docx
properties.content:
Causes and solutions of traffic accidents
In the modern life these days, traffic accidents  more and more popular in the general public. Therefore, there are a lot of causes as well as solutions of this problem dicussed in the following essy.
It is clear that there are a lot of important causes of this problem that we needs to cosider carefully. Frist and foremost, one the most important causes  is that people break traffic rules. They often drive after drinking alcohol, run red lights, drive too fast, or use their phones while driving. These dangerous behaviors can easily lead to serious accidents. Moreover, another important cause is that traffic system is bad. In many places, the roads are narrow and full of potholes. There are not enough traffic lights or warning signs, and some streets are easily flooded in the rainy season. These bad conditions make it very dangerous for drivers and can easily cause accidents. In short, they are all main causes of this problem that we are easy to

properties.title: Nguyễn Huỳnh Gia Huy ( Causes and effects of climate change ).docx
properties.content:
Causes and effects of climate change
+ Humans cut down the trees.
+ The environment is polluted.
+ It will affect the environment.
+ It will affect the health.
In the modern life these day, climate change. is more and more popular in the general public.Therefore, there are a lot  of causes as well as solutions of thí problem discussed in the following essay. It is very clear that there are a lot of important causes of this problem that we need to consider carefully.
First and foremost, one of the most important causes is that humans cut down many trees. When people cut trees, there are fewer trees to clean the air. As a result, more carbon dioxide stays in the atmosphere and the weather becomes hotter. Cutting trees also makes many animals lose their homes. Moreover, another important cause is that the environment is polluted. Many factories and cars produce a lot of smoke and waste. This makes the air and water dirty. As a result, people can get sick, and the Earth becomes hotter and

properties.title: Advantages-Disadvantages.docx
properties.content:
In the modern life these days, many people think that Computers are being used more and more in education and so there will soon be no role for the teacher in education. In my opinion, I will specially agree with the idea due to the following reasons.
It is very clear that there are a lot of important advantages of this problem that we need to consider carefully. First and foremost, on of the most important advantages is that the computer displays more visually. That is because It has a screen and speakers through which it can transmit images and sound. This means that students can learn easily and conveniently. Moreover, another important advantages is that the computer helps us access many documents. That is because It connects to the internet and we can access many websites. From there, we can study anytime. In addition, there are also many games for us to relax. In short, thay are all main advantages of computers are being used more and more education that we are easy to see.

properties.title: Advantages-Disadvantages.docx
properties.content:
In the modern life these days, many people think that Computers are being used more and more in education and so there will soon be no role for the teacher in education. In my opinion, I will specially agree with the idea due to the following reasons.
It is very clear that there are a lot of important advantages of this problem that we need to consider carefully. First and foremost, on of the most important advantages is that the computer displays more visually. That is because It has a screen and speakers through which it can transmit images and sound. This means that students can learn easily and conveniently. Moreover, another important advantages is that the computer helps us access many documents. That is because It connects to the internet and we can access many websites. From there, we can study anytime. In addition, there are also many games for us to relax. In short, thay are all main advantages of computers are being used more and more education that we are easy to see.

Moreover, another important advantages is that the computer helps us access many documents.

In fact, besides teaching academic knowledge, teachers also help students improve many important skills for their future such as soft skills, life skills, communication skills, and money management skills.

properties.title: Nguyễn Huỳnh Gia Huy ( Causes and effects of climate change ).docx
properties.content:
Causes and effects of climate change
+ Humans cut down the trees.
+ The environment is polluted.
+ It will affect the environment.
+ It will affect the health.
In the modern life these day, climate change. is more and more popular in the general public.Therefore, there are a lot  of causes as well as solutions of thí problem discussed in the following essay. It is very clear that there are a lot of important causes of this problem that we need to consider carefully.
First and foremost, one of the most important causes is that humans cut down many trees. When people cut trees, there are fewer trees to clean the air. As a result, more carbon dioxide stays in the atmosphere and the weather becomes hotter. Cutting trees also makes many animals lose their homes. Moreover, another important cause is that the environment is polluted. Many factories and cars produce a lot of smoke and waste. This makes the air and water dirty. As a result, people can get sick, and the Earth becomes hotter and
